text: Werner Klingelfuss (born June 11, 1913, date of death unknown) is a Swiss canoeist who competed in the 1936 Summer Olympics. In 1936 he and his partner Rudolf Vilim finished fifth in the K-2 1000 metres competition. ==References== *Werner Klingelfuss' profile at Sports Reference.com Category:1913 births Category:Year of death missing Category:Canoeists at the 1936 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic canoeists of Switzerland Category:Swiss male canoeists
title: Werner Klingelfuss
